      :staticmethod:


      Returns list of drives with capacity and utilization
      list item contains:
          block device (/dev/sXX)
          total capacity (in bytes)
          used space
          free space
          utilization (as a percent)
          mount point



   .. py:method:: get_network()

                }
      }
